creator: andrea.alberici
text:
User training is the process of teaching users how to use a software application or system. It is an important part of the software development process, as it ensures that users are able to use the system effectively and efficiently. 
User training can be conducted in a variety of ways, including online tutorials, in-person training sessions, or a combination of both. The goal of user training is to help users learn how to use the system in a way that is best suited to their needs and abilities. 
User training is an important part of the software development process, as it ensures that users are able to use the system effectively and efficiently.
title: DELIVERABLE: User Training
summary: User training is the process of teaching users how to use a software application or system. It is an important part of the software development process, as it ensures that users are able to use the system effectively and efficiently.
